headline: How To Earn $500 A Month From Bank of America Stock Ahead Of Q4 Earnings
summary: Investors are turning their focus to Bank of America‘s (NYSE:BAC) dividend as the lender heads into its upcoming earnings report. Before the opening bell on Wednesday, Jan. 14, analysts expect the bank to report fourth-quarter earnings of 96 cents per share. That’s up from 82 cents per share in the year-ago period. headline: Bank Of America's Top 3 Commodity Stock Picks For 2026
summary: Bank of America’s 2026 message for commodity investors is clear: stick with gold, don't miss uranium's rally and buy copper before the market fully reprices it. In a note shared Wednesday to clients, the firm’s commodity analyst Lawson Winder named three companies: Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd. (NYSE:AEM) as the preferred precious-metals name Cameco Corp. headline: Why small, medium businesses are 'cautiously optimistic' about 2026
summary: Small and medium-sized business owners are remaining cautiously optimistic in their 2026 outlook, according to Bank of America's latest Business Owner Report, as they continue to contend with inflation and even tariff pressures. Bank of America President of Business Banking Sharon Miller shares the findings from the survey, noting how 70% of these surveyed businesses plan to expand this year.
